subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3232, how did it go?
description_text:
Not very well can't calibrate the pedals it seems to be stuck saying simsonn flasher . Main controller is in upgrade mode

On Tue, 25 Nov 2025, 4:05â€¯pm SIMSONN, <no-reply @loox.io> wrote:

conversations.body_text: Hi kelvin garmonsway,    If your pedal is in upgrade mode, simply release the upgrade button on the control box and reconnect the USB. This will allow the device to return to normal operating mode.
